name: PotionWorks
description: As a magic apprentice, you long for the opportunity to rise through the ranks of the Wizards’ Guild. You recently joined the group and you’re tasked with brewing potions using your magical cauldron and the ingredients available to you. However, there are still plenty of dangers and challenges with potion brewing, as even a small mistake can spell disaster. Regardless, mastering the art of potion brewing will earn you the rank of Mage.
